H0.text: Soil, water, and oxygen are what a plant needs to make sugar through photosynthesis.

H1.text: Oxygen, sunlight, and soil are what a plant needs to make sugar through photosynthesis.

H2.text: Carbon dioxide, sunlight, and soil are what a plant needs to make sugar through photosynthesis.

H3.text: Sunlight, water, and carbon dioxide are what a plant needs to make sugar through photosynthesis.

A4.text: Oxygen is a waste product of light-dependent reactions.

A5.text: CO2 + 2H2O + photons light energy â†’ [CH2O] carbohydrate + O2 + H2O.
